item.title: Converting AD timestamps to Excel date
item.description: How To convert AD / NTFS timestamps like pwdLastSet or lastLogonTimeStamp into Excel Date: Convert online: https://www.epochconverter.com/ldap Convert using Command Line: w32tm /ntte {serial} Convert using Excel formula: =(A1/10^11/8,64)-109205
